website_summaries.verdict: Whether practicing on a pond or taking to the ice rink to develop basic skills, these ice hockey skates are a good choice for kids.
pros: Rugged construction with superior ankle support that's ideal for youngsters who are learning the sport
Can be worn by boys or girls
cons: Foot bed padding could be better – some parents remedied this minor flaw with extra pairs of socks

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for hockey
customer_reviews.text: These skates might work for beginners who just want to skate around, but I wouldn't recommend them for beginning hockey players even. Low quality skate. Pick a Bauer or CCM instead
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken...
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and they were already broke... ive seen other photos on here of these defect. I can't believe they would just repackage and just send them back out to someone new...
customer_reviews.author: Robert McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect. Son loves them and never wants to take them off.
customer_reviews.text: Son loves these skates, he even wears them around the house. They look like my 800 dollar skates and fit perfectly. From what I can tell my scraping my nail on them is that they are already sharpened. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: MattMSimpson37

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought these skates for our 8 year old son to wear for his Hockey team. They broke the second time he ever put them on. As he was tying his skate up, the lace-hole ripped right through the leather. We couldn't believe it had happened. He had only ever worn them once before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my brother for his 9th birthday and they broke after 2 uses. The shoelace hole broke through and there's no way to repair it. He's not a hockey player or plays roughly. He just uses them to skate around and they apparently could not handle that.... So just be aware, they're cheap for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: ... has worn them once so far and says they're comfortable. He was skating in below zero temps and ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has worn them once so far and says they're comfortable. He was skating in below zero temps and didn't complain about his feet being cold after 2 hours. The insides aren't super padded, so extra socks are helpful. I ordered a size or two larger than his shoe size to leave room for wool socks and seems like the size is good for him with some room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Scribners

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I like it because they look/feel/smell durable.....haha! Although i bought a bigger size, i having really high hopes that these skates will last until my niece (even those skate's indicate boys) grows out of it, and then soon pass it down to my nephew. No complains
customer_reviews.author: Winston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality ice skates
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality ice skates! My son doesn't want to leave the rink on these things, and he learned to skate on them. I may have 50+ heart attacks while he is on the ice :) But we are all very happy with his first pair of ice skates.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Pretty straightforward
customer_reviews.text: They were true to size and are holding up fine. Comes with a factory edge, but I did get them sharpened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: These skates are amazing. I never received them and Amazon wouldn't post my other review stating that they never showed up as promised but I am sure my son will love them 3+ days after his birthday.... Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: ED K

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: Would like to return. Bought as a Christmas present and doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Arslan has

customer_reviews.title: Hockey skate
customer_reviews.text: Good hockey skate. I purchased my son a size 13 which is his current shoe size. Still left him some room for growth in the next months.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Skate great price
customer_reviews.text: Great skate for my 7yo. Fits well and he was able to wear them 3hrs a day right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, nice for a young one to learn on.
customer_reviews.author: jody

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: very bad it hurt your feet when you are wearing
customer_reviews.author: Marina Voytenko

customer_reviews.title: Owsome skates.
customer_reviews.text: Great ice skates fits perfect on my son Not a single complaint.
customer_reviews.author: octavio romero

customer_reviews.title: future hockey player
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson. He loves them. Good investment for a new skater. Better support than renting. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved these shipping was good no problem at all
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved these shipping was good no problem at all
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: after a few months of use the lace holes are tearing out
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: True to shoe size, great for beginners. They get the job done for my 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: my grandson absolutely loved these skates. good fit, good support. great quality for price. would recommend to all my friends,
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I would like to return
customer_reviews.text: Hi sorry for bothering you.Thank you for your delivery but it's too small.I would like to return.Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Good fit. My son took off in them right away. Plenty of room for kids with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Erica chase

customer_reviews.title: My granson loves them
customer_reviews.text: I live in Las Vegas and I do not know of anyplace I could have bought these locally. There are several ice skating rinks in the city and what better place to get your exercise while staying cool. My grandson loves for me to pick him up and take him skating.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best choice, best fit, our 6 yr. old, got up and started right away, easy to balance...great quality.....
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit my little one uses for his hockey classes
customer_reviews.text: Great fit my little one uses for his hockey classes. Way cheaper than buying in other places and functional just as great. No complaints it fit great took to the ice arena just to sharpen and it was great. I recommended it is great material sturdy and fits comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Mcpherson Family

customer_reviews.title: These skates were for my nephew and he loves them ...
customer_reviews.text: These skates were for my nephew and he loves them. They do require a break in period, and he did have a very small blister on the inside of his calf, but he did not seem to care too much.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Trzebunia

customer_reviews.title: YOUTH Skates
customer_reviews.text: These skates have a very misleading title. I ordered them and was excited to get, but then saw that they were youth sized. I did not know that "boys' meant youth.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Nocka

product_meta.title: American Athletic Shoe Boy's Ice Force Hockey Skates
product_meta.description: The entry level Ice force hockey skate is for indoor and outdoor ice hockey or recreation. The skate features multilayered boot construction to ensure ankle stability, moisture resistant Cambrelle lining for added comfort and easy break-in, a cut resistant box toe and a nylon blade holder and performance edge carbon steel blade.
feature_bullets: Perfect for the backyard or pond hockey
Sizing is true to shoe size
